name: discord_bulk_send
description: Send a message to multiple Discord channels in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling discord_send_message multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all channel URLs as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message text to send to each channel

steps.label: Send to each channel in parallel

detailSteps.code: const el = document.querySelector('div[role="textbox"][contenteditable="true"]'); if (!el) return { status: 'input_not_found', channel: window.location.href }; el.focus(); document.execCommand('insertText', false, `{{message}}`); el.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', {bubbles: true})); await new Promise(r => setTimeout(r, 500)); el.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent('keydown', {key: 'Enter', code: 'Enter', keyCode: 13, which: 13, bubbles: true})); return { status: 'sent', channel: window.location.href }
detailSteps.name: send_result
detailSteps.label: Send message
